title: Trade Card, Image of a Young Girl, late 19th century
description: Vertical rectangle. Depicted is a young girl with brown hair worn in bangs and to her shoulders. Only her head is visible as the rest of her body is covered behind what appears to be a green  paper.  Her head seems to have poked through the paper stopping at her neck.

tombstone.epitaph: Trade Card, Image of a Young Girl, late 19th century; chromolithograph; 1959-30-1-17
